article.title: EDO Awarded Contract Modification
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: EDO Communications and Countermeasures Systems Incorporated is being awarded a $36 million modification to a previously awarded contract for the production and support of 548 JCREW 2.1 Radio-Controlled Improvised Explosive Device Electronic Warfare systems to meet urgent U.S. Defense Department requirements in support of Operation Iraqi Freedom.
